overview: Looking for true love! When Casey Calvert suspects her husband, Bill, of cheating on her, she'll go to no small sacrifice to catch him in the act. Casey deploys bombshell Belle Noire to seduce Bill, but ends up falling in love with Belle in the process! Belle has a girlfriend already, but Casey is hopelessly in love with her and ready to end her failed marriage so they can be together. Will Casey leave her husband, and will Belle and Casey end up together? Find out in the sixth installment of Lesbian Love Stories.
title: Lesbian Love Stories 6
